description:
Nishino Kimi was an assistant for http://anidb.net/ch68389 [Kanou Akihiro], aiding in his ghoulification experiments. Previously, she was http://anidb.net/ch98562 [Nishio Nishiki]`s lover, and a medical student at Kamii University. Though aware of his http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] nature, she remained loyal to him and kept his secret. After the Owl Suppression Operation, http://anidb.net/ch67131 [he] left http://anidb.net/ch68590 [her] in order to keep her safe.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Nishino Kimi
